external_games.name: Read Only Memories: NEURODIVER Collector's Edition - Nintendo Switch
Read Only Memories: NEURODIVER Collector's Edition - Play Station 5

name: Read Only Memories: Neurodiver - Collector's Edition
summary: Each copy of the game includes: physical copy of the game on Nintendo Switch/PlayStation 5, art book, NEURODIVER plush, double-sided acrylic charm featuring ES88, prismatic sticker sheet, instruction manual, soundtrack download card, collector’s edition box.
